staff.name: Shyam Natarajan, PhD
staff.title: Founder / CEO
items: Expertise in image-guided interventions, machine learning, and embedded systems
Instrumental in the commercialization of targeted prostate biopsy creating and executing the foundational validation studies
Led an NIH-funded lab as a professor at UCLA Urology, Surgery, and Bioengineering

staff.name: Brit Berry-Pusey, PhD
staff.title: Founder / COO
items: 8+ years in Market Access, Contracts, Strategy, and Business Development in medical device, digital therapeutics, and pharma
UCLA and Stanford Graduate School of Business training
Expertise in Cardiology, Diabetes, Medical Imaging, Oncology, and Urology

staff.name: Leonard S. Marks, MD
staff.title: Founder / CMO
items: Professor and deKernion Endowed Chair of Urology at UCLA
Pioneer and world leader in Targeted Prostate Biopsy, Active Surveillance, and Focal Therapy
150+ peer-reviewed publications, 30+ clinical trials, 10+ federal grants

staff.name: Joshua Shubert
staff.title: AI Lead
items: M.S. in Electrical Engineering from Johns Hopkins
Industry experience in cloud-based medical software
Background in deep learning, medical imaging, and robotics

staff.name: Phillip Allen
staff.title: Director of Manufacturing Operations

Medical device industry background in Operations, Manufacturing Engineering, and New Product Introduction
Business training from the London School of Economics and Kelley School of Business

staff.name: Prateek Bhatnagar

staff.name: Alan Priester, PhD

Expertise in data science, medical imaging, and rapid prototyping
